This guide is intended to help new members of our research group get their environments up and running, 
or old members who need to get new hardware up and running. 

In it's current form, it's assumed you're using a Mac computer.
The guide will assume you are very new to computer concepts such as running terminal commands, and I will try to be as clear as possible. 

**Before starting, you must:**

1. Register an account at [GitHub](https://github.com){target="_blank"}
2. Know, or be able to access your GitHub and computer password


**This guide will guide you through the following steps:**

* Determine if you use an Intel or Apple silicon Mac
* Installing Homebrew
* Installing `gh-cli`
* Installing R, and choose the correct version according to if you have Intel or Apple Silicon
* Installing RStudio
